name: verifiable

able to be proved: Throughout the trial, he didn't produce a single verifiable fact.

Add to word list
if a statement, number, etc. is verifiable, it can be checked and proved to be correct: verifiable details/evidence/facts The inquiry found no verifiable evidence of document or data falsification. The treaty aims to make developing countries' emissions cuts verifiable.
